participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Intellectual and introspective, enjoys reading and values health.
participant_1.background: i read twenty books a year. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household.

participant_2.name: Michelle
participant_2.personality: Energetic and motivated, passionate about fitness and helping others.
participant_2.background: my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.

content.text: hi , how is it going . my name is michelle .
